folder: Delancey Street & Allen Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Delancey Street, at the N.E. corner of Allen Street. Building shown is being demolished to widen Allen Street.
January 21, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Allen Street & Delancey Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
120 Allen Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of Delancey Street.
April 7, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Delancey Street & Allen Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Delancey Street, at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Allen Street. Also shown is Allen Street, east side, north from Delancey Street.
April 5, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Allen Street & Delancey Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Allen Street, north from Delancey Street,showing the longitudinal park that separates north (right) and south bound port'ons of this thoroughfare. The latter is the old Street while the formor and the park are newly constructed. Note the 2nd Ave. "El" line and its Rivington Street station. These formerly darkened both sides of Allen Street and practically prohibited penetration.
March 1929
Eugene L. Armbruster
